mosinstall.name: Show Children Submenu
mosinstall.author: Mike Teigen
mosinstall.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description:
Based on Show Submenu Enhanced by Paul Lindhout (http://2www.move-it.nl).

Automatically creates a submenu containing an items children within it as determined by the mainmenu. Place this item on any page where the item being viewed has children set to it within the main menu.

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
